name: HH_INTVTN_CONTACT
description: Contains Home Health care plan intervention contact information.

columns.name: INTERVENTION_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the care plan intervention.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PERFORMED_YN
columns.description: Care plan intervention contact interventions performed.  Yes or no.

columns.name: VARIANCE_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: Care plan intervention contact variance code.  Links to category table ZC_VARIANCE_CODE.

columns.name: CNCT_SEQUNCE_NUM
columns.description: Care plan intervention contact sequence number.

columns.name: VISITS_DEFERRED_YN
columns.description: Care plan intervention contact visits deferred.  Yes or no.

columns.name: CONTACT_NOTES_ID
columns.description: Care plan intervention contact notes ID.

columns.name: DOC_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item tracks the source of intervention documentation among multiple platforms. The most recent documentation source will overwrite the previous one if two platforms are used for the same intervention.
